de.zorgk.drums
Interface HitInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChinaMixer, CrashMixer, HihatMixer, RideMixer, RoundRobin, SampledDrum, SplashMixer
public interface HitInterface

Interface for objects that behave like a sampled drum

Author:
immanuel
